1.<center>王家の財宝を荒らす者は 誰だ……。|我が眠りを妨げる者は 誰だ…: Who is he who would lay waste to the treasures|of the crown who would disturb my slumbers?

2.<center>また現れたのか……いやしい賊め……。|これ以上 王家の財宝を荒ら: Here you are again, you vile bandit, to|further ruin the treasures of the royal family|and disturb my slumber.

3.<center>秘宝の守護者を おそれず|何度も やってきおって……。|貴様……: Who are you that you have come so many times|without fear of the guardians of the|treasures?

4.<center>貴様の勇気に免じ 我が名を教えてやろう……。|我は この大ピラミ: For your bravery, I will tell you my name for|I am Arach Kamen, the Pharaoh of the Pharaohs|who built the Great Pyramid.

5.<center>我のなきがらは 神秘のチカラを宿す|秘宝と共に このピラミッドに:
My remains, along with the hidden treasure|that holds the power of mystery, were placed|in this Pyramid... all to protect the golden|
|treasure...

7.<center>神聖なる黄金の秘宝が けがされぬよう|我は この地に眠る死者を:
I have raised the dead from the dead who lie|here to protect our treasure so that the|sacred gold of the treasure may not be|
|destroyed.

8.<center>秘宝の守護者の中には かつて|ファラオと呼ばれた 時の王たちもい:
Among the guardians of the treasures are the|kings of time, once known as the Pharaohs...|the golden treasure is the pride of my|
|family...

9.<center>なぜだ……。|なぜ しつように 黄金の秘宝を狙う……？|何が貴様: Why do you persistently seek the Gold|Treasure? What is it that drives you to the|treasure?

10.<center>幾度となく この地を訪れる 貴様は……|まさか 伝説の秘宝の探求: You have visited this place many times... are|you Syndra, the legendary seeker of hidden|treasures? Why are you here?

11.<center>伝説の秘宝の探求者 シンドラ……。|まさか 死んだはずの貴様と: Syndra, seeker of legendary treasures I never|thought I'd see you again after you had died.

12.<center>シンドラ……。思い返せば 貴様と我の勝負は|いまだ 決していなか: Syndra... as I recall, you and I have never|had a contest before... but perhaps it was|fate that brought us together here...

13.<center>おかしい……。貴様とは 何度も戦ったが|なぜ 愛用していた あの:
Strange... I have fought you many times, but|why do you not use that curved sword of the|Sun God that you used to love so much? Do you|
|underestimate me?　Oh, abominable...

15.<center>そうか……。貴様 シンドラではなかったのだな。|あやつのような: So... you are not Syndra. I never thought I'd|see a bony treasure seeker like you again.

16.<center>どうしたことだ……。胸が おどる……。|貴様の足音が この地に:
What's the matter with you my heart beats|faster every time I hear your footsteps|approaching this place what have you done to|
|me? What have you done to me?

17.<center>きょ……今日は 少し遅かったな……。|このアラハ・カーメンを じ: You're a little late today to be messing with|this Arach Karmen, but you've got more guts|than Syndra. ...

18.<center>遅い……！ 遅いぞ 貴様ああぁぁぁ……！|さては 貴様……我の心:
You're late...!　You're late, you ah...! So,|you're the one who enjoys playing with my|heart, I won't let you go, I won't let you|
|go...!

19.<center>我は 死にながらにして 生きがいを|見つけてしまった……。それは: I have found my purpose in life even in death|and that is to fight you for the Golden|Hallows. ...

20.<center>よく来たな 奇跡の探求者よ！|さあ 今日も 我の血潮をたぎらせて: Welcome, miracle seeker! Let my blood run hot|today! Go, guardian of treasures!

22.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。|王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！: Guardian of the treasures. Give death to those|who would avenge the crown...!

39.<center>ゆけっ 秘宝の守護者よ！|王家に仇なす者に 死を与えるのだ！: Go, guardians of the treasure! Give death to|those who would harm the crown!

40.<center>死せる者に 生きがいを与えるとは|貴様は まさに 奇跡の探求者よ: To give the dead a reason to live, you are|truly a miracle seeker...

41.<center>ゆけっ 秘宝の守護者よ！|今日こそ この者に 泣きを見せるのだ！: Go, guardian of treasures! Today is the day|you will make him weep!
